courtInstructions: File your response at the Justice Court in [county] County. In Texas, you typically have until 11 AM on the Monday following the return date listed on the citation to file your answer. The filing fee is around $54 but can be waived if you qualify for indigent status. File a written answer form and request a trial. You may also file counterclaims for habitability issues or improper charges.
